str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Capernaum, a town of Galilee. Of Hebrew origin; Capernaum, a place in Palestine.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I raise on high, lift up, (b) I exalt, set on high. From hupsos; to elevate.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To go down, come down, either from the sky or from higher land, descend. From kata and the base of basis; to descend.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.
Hades, the unseen world. Properly, unseen, i.e. 'Hades' or the place of departed souls.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Feminine Plural
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

Sodom. Plural of Hebrew origin; Sodoma, a place in Palestine.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
As far as, until, even to.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Today, now. Neuter of a presumed compound of the article ho and hemera; on the day; generally, now.
